text: Ñɨn olap Jisas binɨb okok kɨlop takaw agñɨlɨg yek. Pen nab anɨb ak, bɨ Pelisi ogɨnap, bɨ kɨli Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨgtep gep ogɨnap, kɨli kuŋay yɨbɨl ap besɨg yelak. Bɨ anɨb okok, ogɨnap Galili plopens nɨb, ogɨnap Judiya plopens nɨb, ogɨnap Jelusalem nɨb owlak. Pen God kɨles ne ak Jisas nop ñek, binbɨ mɨñak gak okok gek suŋ lɨnɨg gak.
